thread.section_title: Vision Direct Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vision Direct Australia | www.visiondirect.com.au
thread.title: Ryan
thread.title_full: Vision Direct Australia reviewed by Ryan

author: Ryan
title: Ryan
text: I have bought two pairs of sunglasses from vision direct. both times the service has been excellent, same day dispatch and quick post. The first time I didn't realise the sunglasses would be posted from overseas and normally i would be a little worried about fake products. Not to worry though, great product and very good service.
